citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am on June
14, 2021.
The inspector called the licensee, and he stated that he was out of town for the day and there were no other
representatives available to accompany the APHIS Official.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am on June 
14, 2021. 
The inspector called the licensee, and he stated that he was out of town for the day and there were no other 
representatives available to accompany the APHIS Official. 
 
 
 
End Section
